metadata.title: CVE-2015-8688 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Gajim before 0.16.5 allows remote attackers to modify the roster andintercept messages via a crafted roster-push IQ stanza.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8688` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gajim - 0.16.5-0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gajim package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.16.5-0.1').
